title: New Galaxy Watch 4 update brings stability improvements and May 2022 patches
content:
Samsung has started rolling out a fresh software update for the Galaxy Watch 4. While you’d expect the update to finally bring Google Assistant support to the Wear OS smartwatches, sadly, that’s not the case. Instead, the update only packs some system stability improvements and the latest security patches. According to user reports onÂ Reddit, the

The post New Galaxy Watch 4 update brings stability improvements and May 2022 patches appeared first on XDA.
description: Samsung is rolling out a fresh update to the Galaxy Watch 4, bringing system stability improvements and May 2022 patches to its Wear OS smartwatches.
